Inspiration is a Time Machine
Dan Stroot
September 22, 2023

Companies say they want engaged employees. Engagement seems like a pretty low bar. Funny, I’ve never heard an employee say they wanted to be "engaged ". Personally, I’d much rather be inspired. When you’re high on inspiration, you can get two weeks of work done in 24 hours. Inspiration literally brings the future forward.
